name: Friends of the Earth Food Co-op & Cafe
description: Community-run organic wholefoods store and cafe, offering bulk groceries and organic produce.
products: Organic groceries; bulk wholefoods; vegan foods; cafe menu items

name: Sage Bulk Wholefoods - Eltham
description: Local zero-plastic grocery store offering organic wholefoods, pantry staples and eco-friendly household goods.
products: Organic bulk grains; nuts; spices; pantry staples; cleaning and personal care

name: Sage Bulk Wholefoods - Ivanhoe
description: Local zero-plastic grocery store offering organic wholefoods, pantry staples and eco-friendly household goods.
products: Organic bulk grains; nuts; spices; pantry staples; cleaning and personal care

name: Bellarine Wholefoods
description: Sustainable grocery store with zero-waste refills for bulk foods and eco-products.
products: Bulk grains; nuts; flours; pulses; herbs; spices; oils; vinegars; cleaning products

name: Bulk Eats Warehouse
description: Wholesale bulk-food supplier with click-and-collect/delivery; stocks dry goods, groceries and cleaning supplies.
products: Bulk grains; pulses; nuts; canned goods; beverages; cleaning supplies

name: Queen Victoria Market
description: Iconic Melbourne market with a dedicated organic produce section, offering certified organic fruits, vegetables, dairy, eggs and specialty foods.
products: Organic fruits; vegetables; free-range eggs; dairy; specialty foods

name: Coburg Farmers Market
description: Weekly market (Saturdays) at Coburg Primary School with many certified organic growers; offers fresh seasonal fruit, vegetables, free-range eggs, artisanal breads and baked goods.
products: Certified organic fruit and vegetables; free-range meat and eggs; artisanal breads; cheeses
notes: Bring own bags; plastic bag free

name: Gasworks Farmers Market
description: Monthly market in Albert Park’s Gasworks Arts Park with certified organic fruits, vegetables, dairy and eggs; VFMA-accredited since 2006.
products: Organic vegetables; fruits; dairy; free-range eggs; artisan preserves

name: Veg Out St Kilda Farmers' Market
description: Monthly market at Peanut Farm Reserve, St Kilda (first Saturday) with certified organic fruits, vegetables, herbs and other local produce.
social_links: Organic vegetables; herbs; fruits; jams; sauces; gourmet mushrooms

name: Bendigo Community Farmers Market
description: Regional market with many biodynamic and organic vendors offering fruits, vegetables, honey, dairy and meats.
social_links: Organic fruits; vegetables; herbs; honey; eggs; dairy; free-range meats

name: Mornington Peninsula Farmers Market
description: Monthly Mornington market with certified organic fruits, vegetables, olives and cheese from Peninsula growers.
social_links: Organic fruits; seasonal vegetables; olive oils; cheeses; organic baked goods

name: Mansfield Farmers Market
description: Regional market offering organically and sustainably grown produce, including certified organic fruits, vegetables, meats and artisanal goods.
social_links: Certified organic fruits; vegetables; herbs; organic meats; eggs; jams

name: Ballarat Farmers Market
description: Monthly Ballarat market at Lake Wendouree featuring certified organic seasonal produce, free-range eggs, honey and artisan baked goods.
social_links: Organic seasonal fruit and vegetables; free-range eggs; honey; organic bread and baked goods

name: Passionfoods Organic (South Melbourne)
description: Longstanding organic supermarket (also online) selling fresh organic fruits, vegetables and wholefood groceries.
products: Organic fruit; vegetables; groceries; natural personal care

name: Replenish for Health (Williamstown)
description: Organic supermarket in Williamstown selling organic produce, pantry staples and sustainable household products.

name: Organically Grown (Malvern)
description: Family-run store providing 100% certified organic fruit, vegetables and groceries; emphasizes Australian-sourced organic produce.
products: 100% organic fruit; vegetables; meat; dairy; bread; bulk foods; health foods; groceries

name: Terra Madre (Northcote)
description: Well-known organic supermarket stocking a wide range of ACO-certified products in Melbourne’s north.
products: Organic fresh produce; groceries; packaged organic goods; health foods

name: Terra Madre (Brunswick)
description: Second Terra Madre outlet offering a wide range of organic foods and pantry staples; ACO-certified range.
products: Organic groceries; bulk foods; fresh produce; health foods

name: The Source Bulk Foods (Balaclava)
